casebody.data:
The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Stephen J. Sanzone, Appellant.

Judgment of the County Court, Queens County, convicting the defendant of the crimes of robbery in the first degree, grand larceny in the second degree and assault in the second degree, committed as a second offender, unanimously affirmed.

No opinion. Present — Lewis, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Wenzel, JJ.
